html:
Even in deep hell
You can feel safe
Agony here is just a word so far
There are murderers in the hospital
How things are everyone knows
Ground is full of mirabelles
There is devil behind the corners
The gypsy is in deep sleep
The four chairs are alive
Fueled by logic and chaos
The red, hospital, walking device
Is being used for posing
Wrath of god was yesterday
Today maybe it will be a miracle
Wind and rain stopped
Deep night is starting
title: Wrath and miracle
